name: SMART Disk Daemon
description: Ensures smartd (SMART monitoring daemon) is running for disk health checks.
check_cmd: if command -v smartctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active smartd 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart smartd 2>/dev/null || true; fi
verify_cmd: sleep 3; if systemctl is-active smartd 2>/dev/null | grep -q '^active$'; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
